abstract: Google hopes the early announcement of its PowerMeter will help its product and advocacy efforts around energy reform.
snippet: Google hopes the early announcement of its PowerMeter will help its product and advocacy efforts around energy reform.
lead_paragraph: If people knew how much electricity they were using every time they turned on the lights, fired up the oven or lowered the thermostat on their air-conditioner, they would make smarter decisions about their energy use, and presumably, conserve more.
